author: Shawn Smith
comment: It looks like it has potential especially with the nice graph. But I have no idea how to stop the monitor from running. It drained my watch battery. A "check every x minutes" option would be nice or a way to start and stop the monitor manually.
title: Not ready. Uninstalled

author: Hywel Hosking
comment: Perfect app for my needs. On the moto 360 (v2) andriod body started putting workloads already added by google fit into google fit resulting in me walking 10+ miles a day. Moto body was useful as it would check heart rate at regular intervals and add the information to workouts even if the workout was being recorded using google fit. This app has now enabled me to have a historic view of heart rates at regular intervals. It doesnt need to be running on the phone or the watch and it adds to google fit.
title: Perfect dont change it!

author: Stefan Udumalagala
comment: Now I don't need to press buttons  to check my heart beat.. Now it track and saves in google fit...
title: Finally!

author: Chris Brooker
comment: It didn't automatically take my heart rate. It only worked when I took a manual reading.
title: Didn't work on my huawei watch

author: Aravinda Dissanayaka
comment: After installation app was always 'WAITING'. Figured out that there is an app in wear device as well. After I ran it once it was OK from then onwards.
title: Need to run app on watch

author: Thisara Ranawaka
comment: Really nice app and the much better thing is, it's more accurate. Keep it up
title: Great app

author: Travis Jent
comment: The app instantly crashes on my Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge running Android 6.0 with Huawei Smartwatch.

author: Stephen Banton
comment: Its the only app on the store that works with my Honor 7 and LG Urbane just hope update give you the options to log every 5 mins ;-)
title: Wicked little App

author: Doug Hall
comment: Fails to load on Huawei P9 Plus. Install in watch, and sits at "Waiting" forever..

author: Melani Udumalagala
comment: Now I can read my heart rate without any issue...
title: This is great, it works really good....

author: Rory Glynn
comment: Just keeps on crashing. Never opened once.

author: Pekka
comment: This crashes instantly, not working

author: Abigail Porter
comment: Keeps crashing wont open

author: Jason Khoo
comment: Please explain briefly.  When will it monitor and interval?
title: What background monitoring do?

author: Nuno Albuquerque
comment: It is reporting values to fit that are impossible to be retrieved. It raises the question : how reliable are the measurements? Is the time between measurements known? or does it follows any specific algorithm?!
title: Wait! It reads you Heart Rate even when you're not wearing the watch?!

author: Wellington Amaral
comment: Didn't work for me (Galaxy S5/Gear Live).

author: tiamat chapok
comment: It Don't work on smartwatch & make watch to stop working.

author: arthur bellington Googlecalendar
comment: Dont waste your time. Youre welcome
title: Awful

author: P W R
comment: Never could open the app

author: Richard Long Jr
comment: App crashes at startup

author: Suresh Mali
comment: Does not even open.

author: Bianca Thais
comment: Did it give it 5 stars because is always on
